channel.title: W/ some limitations, I can note page bingo *5* people tomorrow
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "W/ some limitations, I can note page bingo *5* people tomorrow"

item.title: W/ some limitations, I can note page bingo *5* people tomorrow
item.content:encoded:
I happened to get a few note pages, and I need to use them for getting the Note by the end of the week. So, one day this week, I can bingo up to five people, but only if they are from a 45-50 person village (my village size is 50, so anything outside that range I can't spy on to try and set it up). Obviously, you also couldn't have your named obscured through the tools of the trade, or have the my name is theme set.

Da Bolt, Underworld Village
